p: To test hypotheses about relationships between risk and adaptive capacity we used a subset of locations ( n = 388 grid cells) where completeness of herbarium specimen sampling was ≥0.7 based on the ratio of observed to expected richness derived from the Chao1 estimator (inset maps Fig. 4; Supplementary Figure S1 and Supplementary Table S2). These locations cover 49% of the Australian land area and span all biomes present (Bureau of Meteorology, 2006).
